Envelope is used in the cases where an individual page/view belongs to a parent set (or folder) - like if you're viewing a page with a photo that actually belongs to a parent slideshow.
setIsContent(boolean) - Method in class com.nbcuni.mps.MPSPageParameters
Use 1 for content level views (eg: Article, Slideshow, Video) and 0 for everything else (eg: Homepage, Landing, Content List, Account)

setReadonly(boolean) - Method in class com.nbcuni.mps.MPSPageParameters
Setting this parameter to NSNumber(value: true) will cause the request to go into "read-only" mode which means that it will attempt to find the existing record using the site/path and read the existing data for the last full request made.
